snippet: Many powerful donors in the entertainment industry chose Barack Obama over Hillary Rodham Clinton in 2008, but their calculations are different this time.
abstract: Conversations with many powerful Democratic donors in entertainment industry suggest that there is widespread support for Hillary Rodham Clinton should she decide to run for president in 2016; Clinton is headed to Hollywood to  accept an award at an A-list charity event, and it is expected that she will find a decidedly more embracing climate than she did in prelude to 2008 Democratic presidential primary.

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and ADAM NAGOURNEY

lead_paragraph: Many powerful donors in the entertainment industry chose Barack Obama over Hillary Rodham Clinton in 2008, but their calculations are different this time.

headline.main: Hollywood Donors Set to Cast Hillary Clinton in Top Role
headline.print_headline: Hollywood’s Ready to Cast Clinton in Top Role
